station.name: Gold 90.5FM
station.longDesc: Gold 90.5FM is an English radio station of MediaCorp in Singapore. It broadcasts classic hits from the 60s and beyond. Their stable of DJs includes Singapore’s granddaddy of radio, with over 30 years of experience, Brian Richmond.

station.name: Red FM 107.8 FM
station.longDesc: Red FM is an entertainment and music radio station that broadcasts from Sri Lanka. It plays music from the 80s, Hip Hop, Grunge, Electronic Dance and much more. Its team includes Suresh Dee, Kevin, Deanna and Keith, among others..

station.name: Class 95 FM
station.longDesc: Singapore's best mix of music over the airwaves is Class 95FM. Be entertained with hits from the 70s, 80s and 90s

station.name: A BIG HitZ Radio
station.longDesc: A BIG HitZ Radio is Hit Music and commercial free all day long. We are not your conventional music station. It is an unconventional music station that streams music 24/7 via the Internet.

station.name: Insomnia FM
station.longDesc: Insomnia Fm offers a free platform to promote various shows to provide DJ’s & Producers Careers.The shows are available for free streaming at 128 kbps, and also for download by becoming an subscriber, with more than 200 exclusive radio shows!We also provide a monthly InsomniaFM Podcast and a weekly Mix of the Week.

station.name: BBC Radio 1
station.longDesc: BBC Radio 1 is a British radio station operated by the British Broadcasting Corporation which also broadcasts internationally, specialising in modern popular music and current chart hits throughout the day. Radio 1 provides alternative genres after 7 pm, including electronica, dance, hip hop, rock and indie

station.name: BBC Radio 5 Live
station.longDesc: BBC Radio 5 Live is the BBC's national radio service that broadcasts mainly news, sport, discussion, interviews and phone-ins. It is the principal radio station covering sport in the United Kingdom, broadcasting virtually all major sports events staged in the UK or involving British competitors

station.name: The Arrow UK
station.longDesc: The Arrow is a British digital radio station playing classic and contemporary rock music. It broadcasts on DAB Digital Radio and is also streamed over digital satellite TV and online. The station is operated by Global; prior to Global's formation it was owned by their predecessor Chrysalis Radio

station.name: Classic FM UK
station.longDesc: Classic FM is one of the United Kingdom's three Independent National Radio stations. The station broadcasts classical music.

station.name: The Breeze 107.4 FM
station.longDesc: The Breeze is an Independent Local Radio station serving Newbury and West Berkshire. The station is owned & operated by Celador Radio and is part of The Breeze network of stations. It broadcasts from studios at Eastgate House in Andover
